grammar_name: 形容词最高级-基础用法
description: 学习形容词最高级的基础用法：表示三个或三个以上事物中程度最高的

explanation.basic_structure: A + be + the + 形容词最高级 + (in/of) + 范围
basic_rules: 最高级用来表示三个或三个以上事物中程度最高的
单音节和部分双音节形容词用-est
usage_cases: 比较身高：Tom is the tallest in the class.
比较年龄：Mary is the oldest in the family.
比较大小：This book is the biggest of all.
比较价格：This car is the most expensive in the shop.
common_errors: Tom is tallest in the class. (错误) → Tom is the tallest in the class. (正确)
This book is most interesting of all. (错误) → This book is the most interesting of all. (正确)
He is best student. (错误) → He is the best student. (正确)
usage_tips: 单音节和部分双音节形容词用-est
注意不规则形容词的变化

sentences: Tom is the tallest in the class.
This book is the most interesting of all.
He is the best student in the school.
This car is the most expensive in the shop.
She is the happiest girl in the family.

templates.question: Tom is the _____ in the class.
This book is the _____ of all.
This car is the _____ in the shop.
He is the _____ student in the school.

templates.sentence: Tom is tallest in the class.

learning_objectives: 掌握形容词最高级的基本用法

assessment_criteria.excellent: 能够熟练使用最高级，无语法错误
assessment_criteria.good: 基本掌握最高级用法，偶有错误
assessment_criteria.satisfactory: 了解最高级基本用法，需要加强练习
assessment_criteria.needs_improvement: 对最高级用法不熟悉，需要重新学习
